2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Deadpool writer DANIEL WAY joins the ranks of the damned with a new tale of Crossed misery in "Grave New World." In a story that spans the length of the Crossed infection, a naval captain and his loyal crew attempt to outlast the monsters that have overtaken the world. But aboard the vessel there is little joy and the remaining crew wonder if perhaps their leader has gone mad. When two very strange survivors are brought on board a world of hate and vengeance begins to destroy this carefully preserved oasis. In a world of maniacs, there is no help, no hope... there is only the Crossed.

Available with a Regular, Torture, Wraparound, and a special Red Crossed Incentive cover all by Gabriel Andrade.

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Translate : Ultimate Comics Spider-Man (2011) #17 , Ultimate Comics X-Men (2011) #17 , Ultimate Comics Ultimates (2011) #17
Built by Jor-El, Superman’s own father, the robot who fell into the harbor tells the Man of Steel his own harrowing origin story!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Only Child Part 2 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The gang is trying to take a nice, peaceful vacation at an island resort, but the Jabberwocky infestation at the nature preserve next door isn't making that easy! Shaggy and Scooby could be scared off by red-eyed monsters with lion-like paws, unless Velma's keen eye for clues puts an end to the mysterious beasts!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Island of the Jabberwockies; The Phantom of the Opal!

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
An Empire Red-Mother is sent to investigate a fallen Prophet arc.

Red Exmere is tasked by the Empire to find out why it has lost contact with a fellow Earth Mother.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: [untitled]

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Produced as a limited edition for comic book dealers, serious collectors and historians, The Big, Big Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide is an oversized, spiral-bound version of The Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide that includes only the pricing sections and the lists of top comics. In other words, it has no ads and no articles, nothing but copious amounts of pricing and other data. Since 1970, the Guide has been the Bible of comic book collecting enthusiasts. This edition features an original Afterlife with Archie cover by acclaimed series artist Francesco Francavilla.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Vol. 44

volume.name: Big! Big! Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
With back issues comics selling for prices ranging from pocket change up to seven-figure prices, understanding the marketplace has never been more important for buyers, sellers and collectors. Since 1970, The Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide been the Bible for those looking to fully comprehend the back issue marketplace. In addition to the latest market reports, analysis, and prices, this year's edition celebrates the 75th anniversary of Batman, takes a detailed look at rare Canadian comics, and inducts a new line-up of industry professionals into The Overstreet Hall of Fame. Available in hardcover and softcover editions with a Batman cover by J.G. Jones or a Vampirella cover by J. Scott Campbell!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AJ.G. Jones1
BCover BJ. Scott Campbell2

Notes:

  • Cover A is a homage to the Norman Rockwell Saturday Evening Post cover artwork.

volume.name: The Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: This new perfectbound trade paperback contains all the classic strips from the award-winning Knights of the Dinner Table magazine #151-154! These hysterically funny strips are the perfect addition to any gamer's bookshelf!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Volume Forty-Four

volume.name: Knights of the Dinner Table: Bundle of Trouble

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Things get really scrambled when a super-evolved Egghead invades Gotham and makes a monkey out of Batman.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Chapter Forty-Four

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The holidays are in full swing at Riverdale High, and Archie is determined to be Veronica's Secret Santa. When he pulls someone else's name, he has no choice but to find out who has Veronica so he can switch with them. This leads him on a wild goose chase around school - it turns out a lot of people wish they had picked someone else, and it sets off a chain-reaction of switching names! Will he ever find out who is the mystery person who picked Veronica's name? Find out in "Secret Santa Secret Swap," the brand new lead story to this Christmas comics digest!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Secret Santa Secret Swap

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: "CHICKEN TENDERS," Part Four Warning: Sissies will need an adult diaper before reading this one. No joke. No lie. This will be the most talked about issue of CHEW in years.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Chicken Tenders, Part 4 of 5

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Drake, Becky, and Screaming Crow stage a cataclysmic attack on Griselda and her minions. All the forces of nature are brought down upon the Grey Witch. But will it be enough to stop her from using the Six to destroy the world?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Hell and High Water Part Three

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
THE WRATH OF ZEREF

The Council's wizard pulse bomb threatens to obliterate the magic of every wizard on the continent! Fairy Tail’s figured out how to neutralize it, but it won’t be an easy task. Now that they’ve made it out of Tartaros’s prison, Natsu, Erza, Mira, and Lisanna will start their counterattack against the Nine Demon Gates, and execute a daring raid on the Tartaros guild! Then, as if they don’t already have enough problems, Natsu suddenly encounters Zeref the Black Wizard himself! Past the gates of Hell, it’s a desperate battle between fairies and demons to decide the fate of the world!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 370: Devil Reincarnation
  • Chapter 371: Tartaros Arc, Part 2: Song of the Sky Dragon
  • Chapter 372: Breakthrough
  • Chapter 373: Kill or Let Live
  • Chapter 374: Revolution
  • Chapter 375: Herculean Madness
  • Chapter 376: Wendy vs. Ezel
  • Chapter 377: The Sky Dragon's Rage
  • Chapter 378: Friends Forever
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Volume 44

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The blue-BOMBastic conclusion to "Legends of the Blue Bomber" is here! The battle is about to reach its shocking conclusion - or will it? Hard Man is all set to destroy Mega Man, so why is he offering his enemy a free recharge? Spark Man won't hold back as he sets out to avenge his fallen brothers! Meanwhile, Dr. Wily puts the finishing touches on his greatest creation to date, meaning this isn't the end of Mega Man's battles! Featuring new cover art from Mega Man art legend Patrick "SPAZ" Spaziante and variant cover by Ben Bates!
